籤詩版本二:
Icebo, incwadi, nencwadi. Ungalinge wenze ngemva kokucabanga ngaphambi kokucabanga.
Uma isikhathi sifika, abantu abahloniphekile bangakusiza, futhi ungaphila ngokuthula njengegebe.
詩意:
Le ndlu ye-hexagram ifana nodonga.
Konke kuphephile futhi akunangozi.
解曰: Yenza into entsha ngento endala. Izimbali ezibandayo zihlangana entwasahlobo. Ivinjwe ngaphambilini. Manje ngenelisekile.
籤詩故事一:
◇ULiu Ji wayala iNkosi
Ebukhosini base-Ming, uLiu Ji, ogama lakhe lokuhlonipha kwakungu-Bowen kanye nesiqu esithi Wencheng, wazalelwa e-Qingtian (manje eyi-Wencheng County), e-Zhejiang.
Ufundeke kahle kuma-classics nomlando, futhi muhle ekubhaleni izinkondlo nezindatshana. Wayenekhono futhi kwezobuciko bezinkanyezi nobuciko bezempi futhi wasiza uZhu Yuanzhang ukuthi ahlanganise umhlaba.
Ngaleso sikhathi, uZhu Yuanzhang wakhetha futhi wahola amasosha akhe e-Anfeng, enethemba lokukhulula iDolobha lase-Anfeng elivinjezelwe.
U-Liu Ji weza ezomxosha ngokushesha, wahlulela ukuthi uzonqotshwa uma eya lapho. Njengoba uLiu Ji ayelindele, uZhu Yuanzhang wayevaleleke.
OJenene u-Xu Da no-Chang Yuchun beza bezomhlenga, futhi uZhu Yuanzhang wakwazi ukuphunyuka.
聖意: Inhlanhla yekhaya nendlu, wena ngokwakho, ngengcebo, ngezinkinga zokuthengiselana, umshado, kwabesifazane abahamba eLiujia, ngokuvuthwa kwezikelemu sekwephuzile, ngezilwane eziyisithupha, ngokuthola abantu, ukushushiswa komphakathi sekwephuzile, ukufuduka, ukulahleka. impahla futhi akukho mkhondo, izifo, for Yan'an amathuna entabeni, inhlanhla
